title: gift s6
body:
hello ;) i go speak fast beacause im bad in english,  i have a problem with  the  gift of the season6 , i dont have recieved it ;/ it"s normal or not.
(  name in game =  TheNderScrolls )

replies.body:
[We're having issues](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#euw) granting some players ranked rewards on EUW. If you write in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we'll be able to assist you from here.

Let me know if you have any questions.
plz help me i dont have it ,-(

I can't directly help you, but if you reach out in the [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) I mentioned above, one of our specialists will be happy to take a look and resolve any issues with this.

If you are talking about the ranked rewards in the season 6, then YES, there's no problem. Everyone will recieve their rewards after a couple of weeks. Even I haven't recieved them yet. It's normal..

Best wishes, A Kat Main {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
i dont have it , it"s normal or riot have forget me
